item.description: Developers often spend more time editing and debugging than writing new code. This non-linear process involves revisiting and refining code multiple times. item.title: Configuration Drift: The Pitfall of Local Machines
item.description: Configuration drift can disrupt project development when environments deviate from intended setups.
